name: SkyRoll - Ball
description:
SkyRoll is a game that pushes the boundaries of your speed and reaction. The splendid 3D effect scene enables you to experience the imaginary traps and barriers. Now, let's control the ball and conquer the world by overcoming challenges.

How to play?
Drag the ball left or right to avoid all obstacles!
Challenge your speed with the rhythm of the music and try your best to win each level!

Features:
• One-touch control with simple operations
• Stunning 3D worlds and effects
• Rich scenes
• A challenge to test your ultimate speed and fast reflexes!
